Passive.Name: Draw a Bead
Passive.Description: The range of Tristana's basic attacks, Explosive Charge and Buster Shot is increased by 0 - 136 (based on level)

Q.Name: Rapid Fire
Q.Active: Tristana gains bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.

W.Name: Rocket Jump
W.Active: Tristana dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and slowing them by 60%
W.Notes: On enemy champion takedowns or upon detonating Explosive Charge at maximum stacks on an enemy champion, Rocket Jump's cooldown is reset.

E.Name: Explosive Charge
E.Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.
E.Active: Tristana dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and slowing them by 60%
E.Notes: On enemy champion takedowns or upon detonating Explosive Charge at maximum stacks on an enemy champion, Rocket Jump's cooldown is reset.

R.Name: Buster Shot
R.Active: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and knocking back the target and all enemies around them.
